thread.title: Police search for alleged Algiers shoplifter
thread.title_full: Police search for alleged Algiers shoplifter - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: Sam Winstrom, Assignment Editor
title: Police search for alleged Algiers shoplifter
text:
NEW ORLEANS (WVUE) - Police are searching for a woman caught on camera stealing seven pairs of Nikes from an Algiers shoe store.
According to NOPD, the woman shown in the pictures above was shopping in the Famous Footwear store at 3038 Holiday Drive when she placed seven shoe boxes containing Nike shoes into a large mesh shopping bag. Police say she then walked out of the store without paying for them.
The incident occurred around 8 p.m. on Oct. 8.
Anyone with information on the alleged shoplifter and her whereabouts is asked to call NOPD at 504-822-1111.
